page.title: 02The Furniture Factory
page.content: On the 30th of May 1985 my group went to{Devenish Wood Products.}This firm came to Irvinestown in 1974. They make chairs, window frames, kitchens, doors and bar furniture. There are three people employed at the moment. There are no plans for expansion in the business at present. They have plenty of wood. While I was there the men were cutting wood into shapes and polishing it and putting it together. They had about ten different machines and they have a room for spraying and painting the wood. They showed us one completed bar seat and they were in the process of making many more.
